name: Allen Frise
title: Software Developer
about: I am a software developer from Richmond, VA with a passion for building software to make life easier. I have a proven track record of working on projects ranging from graphics shaders to microcontroller logic to high-impact fintech web applications. I am always looking to perfect my craft, and constantly have a few personal projects on the back burner. I have experice working both solo and on an Agile team, and can interface well with clients and coworkers alike.
